items.title: Virgin set to challenge Eurostar on Channel Tunnel route
items.description: Virgin Trains plans to start rival passenger rail services through the Channel Tunnel from 2030.

items.title: Sudan RSF chief promises investigation as anger mounts over el-Fasher killings
items.description: The announcement comes after growing reports of mass killings, including of patients at a hospital.

items.title: Dutch centrist liberals neck and neck with populist Wilders in tight election
items.description: Rob Jetten's D66 party celebrates but with 90% of votes counted the result is too close to call.

items.title: How Kane's NFL dream could become a reality
items.description: Former Kansas City Chiefs punter Dustin Colquitt tells BBC Sport why he thinks Harry Kane can fulfil his dream of becoming an NFL kicker and even offe...

items.title: Starmer rules out investigation after Reeves admits rental rules ‘mistake’
items.description: The PM says an investigation is not "necessary" as the chancellor admits "error" when renting out home.
